div.name: msg_opr_main

ol.li: Import product starts fetching product data from WooCommerce store and will just add that data in Product Queue for processing. (WooCommerce > Processes > Queue Logs > Products)
A Scheduled/Cron Job, running in background will start processing Queues one by one.

For more details please check
User Guide
Import customers starts fetching customers data from WooCommerce store and will just add that data in Customer Queue for processing. (WooCommerce > Processes > Queue Logs > Customers)
A Scheduled/Cron Job, running in background will start processing Queues one by one.

For more details please check
User Guide
It will start fetching Order data from Woocommerce store and will start processing it.
It will fetch the orders for the dates specified in 'Date From' and 'Date To' fields below.
The default value for 'Date From' will be the last execution date of this operation. It will be blank if the last execution date is not found.
The default value for 'Date To' will be current date and time.
Connector only imports those orders which have created after a given date(WooCommerce > Configuration > Settings > Import Order After Date) in the configuration.

For more details please check
User Guide
It will start fetching Order data from WooCommerce store and will just add that data in Order Queue for processing. (WooCommerce > Processes > Queue Logs > Orders)
A Scheduled/Cron Job, running in background will start processing Queues one by one.
Completed Orders are fetched for selected instance.
It will try to fetch the Orders based on dates specified in 'Date From' and 'Date To' fields below.
Connector only imports those orders which have created after a given date(WooCommerce > Configuration > Settings > Import Order After Date) in the configuration.

For more details please check
User Guide
It will start fetching Cancel Order data from WooCommerce store and will cancel imported orders if imported orders are canceled on WooCommerce store.
It will fetch the cancel orders for the dates specified in 'From Date' and 'To Date' fields below.
The default value for 'From Date' will be the last execution date of this operation. It will be blank if the last execution date is not found.
The default value for 'To Date' will be current date and time.

For more details please check
User Guide
The Update Order Shipping Status allows you to change the order status as 'Completed' at Woocommerce store.

For more details please check
User Guide

div.div: It creates new products in Woocommerce store from Odoo as per the options selected below.

ol.li: Import Product Tags allows you synchronize Woocommerce store's product tags to Odoo.

For more details please check
User Guide
Import attributes allows you synchronize Woocommerce store's attributes to Odoo.

For more details please check
User Guide
Import Categories allows you synchronize Woocommerce store's categories to Odoo.

For more details please check
User Guide
Import Coupon starts fetching Coupon data from WooCommerce store and will just add that data in Coupon Queue for processing. (WooCommerce > Processes > Queue Logs > Coupons)
A Scheduled/Cron Job, running in background will start processing Queues one by one.

For more details please check
User Guide
Import stock allows to import product stock from Woocommerce store to Odoo.
Stock will be imported to warehouse as per the configuration in instance.
This operation will generate Inventory Adjustment record for each product under Inventory > Operations > Inventory Adjustments.

Stock will be applied automatically by enable Auto apply inventory adjustment configuration, Otherwise you need to process inventory adjustment transaction record manually to bring stock changes effect.

For more details please check
User Guide
It will export product stock from Odoo to Woocommerce from the warehouse configured under selected instance.
It will export stock of only those products which are already synchronized with Woocommerce store.
It will try to export stock of those products whose stock is updated since last execution of this operation.
If last execution details are not available, it will consider those products whose stock is updated since last 30 days.

For more details please check
User Guide
Update Tags allows you to update the synchronized tags from Odoo to Woocommerce store.

For more details please check
User Guide
Export Tags allows you to export the new tags from Odoo to Woocommerce store.

For more details please check
User Guide
Update Categories allows you to update the synchronized categories from Odoo to Woocommerce store.

For more details please check
User Guide
Export Categories allows you to export the new categories from Odoo to Woocommerce store.

For more details please check
User Guide
Update Coupons allows you to update the synchronized coupons from Odoo to Woocommerce store.

For more details please check
User Guide
Export Coupons allows you to export the new Coupons from Odoo to Woocommerce store.

For more details please check
User Guide
This operation allows to import Odoo Products to WooCommerce layer.

You can export the products into csv/xlsx from Sales > Products > Products. Select Multiple Products or Open a product and click on the 'WooCommerce - Prepare Product for Export ' action from Action menu. Select Export Method > Export in CSV/XLSX file.

For more details please check
User Guide
It will start fetching order data from Woo store based on Woo Commerce order ids provided below and and will just add that data in Order Queue and also process it..
Please provide comma seperated list of Woo Commerce order ids as mentioned below.
Sample list of Woo Commerce order ids: 4129,1367,23466
Please do not use any special symbols like: ~,!,@,#,$,%,^,*,?,/,\,;,.,=,+,-,
Sync product starts fetching product data from Woo Commerce store based on defined woo commerce product template ids and will just add that data in Product Queue and also process it.
Please define woo commerce product template ids with comma separated values without any write quotes.
Please not use any special symbols Like: ~,!,@,#,$,%,^,*,?,/,\,;,.,=,+,-,
Example of define woo commerce product template ids: 4079,4063,4091

For more details please check
User Guide
If multiple products are selected, a maximum of 80 products can be processed at a time.
Username and password are required to export images with the products.
You can set the username and password here => Woocommerce => Configuration => Instances => Set Credentials.

The sale price will be exported if it is lower than the regular price. Otherwise, the sale price will not be exported, but rather overwritten by the Woocommerce store connector and set to 0. For example, in WooCommerce the sale price is 30, the regular price is 20 and the sale price is 40 in Odoo. The sale price will be zero if we export the product with an updated price.
If multiple products are selected, a maximum of 80 products can be processed at a time.
Already exported products will be skipped.
Username and password are required to export images with the products.
You can set the username and password here => Woocommerce => Configuration => Instances => Set Credentials.

div.h5: It will only update those Tags in Woocommerce store, which are already exported.
It will only export those Tags in Woocommerce store, which are yet not exported.
It will only update those Categories in Woocommerce store, which are already exported.
It will only export those Categories in Woocommerce store, which are yet not exported.
It will only update those Coupons in Woocommerce store, which are already exported.
It will only export those Coupons in Woocommerce store, which are yet not exported.

ol.li: If multiple products are selected, a maximum of 80 products can be processed at a time.
